description: The Japanese chef at this restaurant adds his own personal interpretation to Italian dishes. There is a focus on regions such as Marche, Piedmont and Tuscany, where he gained most of his culinary experience. He creates dishes with a delicate feel that is typical of Japan. Traditional cuisine with a unique and exciting twist.
